PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2022-02582022-03-24,  ,  ,  ,  ESDC
ActCanada Worker Lockdown Benefit Act
SubjectOrder Amending the Lockdown Regions Designation Order (COVID-19), No. 3
PrecisOrder No. 3 Amending the LOCKDOWN REGIONS DESIGNATION ORDER (COVID-19) to designate Igloolik and Taloyoak, two communities within Nunavut, as “lockdown regions” in accordance with the Regulations amending the CANADA WORKER LOCKDOWN BENEFIT ACT (LOCKDOWN ORDER DEFINITION AND MINIMUM LOCKDOWN PERIOD), retroactive to the week beginning on March 13, 2022 and ending on March 19, 2022.
RegistrationRegistration: SOR/ 2022-0066 Publication Date: 2022-04-13
AttachmentsAttachment
